      • getRadioServices

        public abstract java.util.List<RadioService> getRadioServices()
        Retrieve the currently known RadioServices of this Radio device The method here is for the convenience of the application developer.
        Returns:
        a list of RadioServices or an empty list

      • startRadioService

        public abstract void startRadioService(RadioService radioService)
        Start a RadioService on an available tuner The method here is for the convenience of the application developer.
        Parameters:
        radioService - the RadioService to start

      • startRadioServiceScan

        public abstract void startRadioServiceScan()
        Scans using all tuners and builds the combined service list. The method here is for the convenience of the application developer. If the application developer wants to perform service scans in the background (in the case the Radio exposes more than on Tuner instances), it's recommended to use the dedicated method calls in the Tuner objects.

      • initializeTuner

        public abstract void initializeTuner(Tuner tuner)
        Initializes a specific Tuner device. You should listen to status changes with a registered TunerListener.
        Parameters:
        tuner - the Tuner to initialize

      • deInitializeTuner

        public abstract void deInitializeTuner(Tuner tuner)
        Deinitializes a specific Tuner device
        Parameters:
        tuner - the Tuner to deinit
